attributes.action: Simplyfy the uk taxation system so that ordinary people do not need expert advise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current u.k. tax system, legislation and collection system is so complex in design and regulation that it is difficult to understand, apply and collect. It seems to me there is a moral issue here which is that a taxation system should be both fair and easy to understand for all and that no one should require an expert to fill out a tax form.
